```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}
StateZHVI1bed   <- read_csv("StateZHVI1Bedroom.csv")
```


```{r}
g9 <- ggplot(StateZHVI1bed, aes(Date, ZHVI,
                                 color = RegionName)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(~RegionName) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

ggplotly(g9)
```
